arts.ttl: Why is Jude Bellingham not playing today for Real Madrid against Mallorca in LaLiga?
arts.sum: However, against Mallorca, Real Madrid will be without Jude Bellingham . In addition to Real Madrid’s game, Bellingham is also expected to miss the entirety of England’s fixtures across the September and October international breaks.

arts.sum: Apart from a solid rear-guard, Kylian Mbappé has started the season in flying form and has bagged three goals . arts.sum: RB: Trent Alexander-Arnold - After featuring as a late substitute in Madrid's victory over Oviedo, the England international should regain a starting role for Los Blancos' upcoming game.
